subject: Hello Online Fund Beneficiar
body:
Hello Online Fund Beneficiary,
You should stop Ignoring My E-mails to you?
Take note that the activation fee will also be credited to your online
account bank, you will also confirm the amount you pay into your
online bank account, after payment, the money you paid must be added
back into your online bank account and reflected in your account
balance after payment.
EMPLOYMENT DETAILS
Occupation/ ……………………………………………………………………………………
Position (grade)/………………………………………………………………………….
Name of employer/ ………………………………………………………………
Work address/ ……………………………………………………………………….
Work/Tele/ Fax/ …………………………………………………….
Copy of your valid ID:.................................
Copy of your utility bill either water or electricity
receipt:...................................
What is your Occupation:......................
The account opening process Activation Fee is the 399Euro but the
money still remains your money into your online bank account.
Our accounts department will set up the account as immediately as
possible you send the fees today. Hence you are able to provide these
requirements. which you will have access to funding online and other
transactions via the internet all around the world.
Thanks for your cooperation,
Mr. Tican Aslen,
The Online Opening Account Control Department Turkey,
EUROPACLEAR BANK

subject: Re:   Hello Online Fund Beneficiar
body:
Hello Mr. Tican Aslen,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if it seemed like I was ignoring you, but I assure you that was not my intention. I'm interested in learning more about this online fund and the activation fee you mentioned.

Could you please provide me with some additional information about the activation fee? How much is it exactly? And how does it work? You mentioned that the fee will be credited to my online bank account, can you explain how that process works?

I also noticed that you mentioned employment details. Could you clarify why those are necessary for opening an online bank account? What kind of benefits or services would I have access to once the account is set up?

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: Hello Online Fund Beneficiar
body: Why are you not getting back to me with the payment slip attachment today?

subject: Re: Hello Online Fund Beneficiar
body:
Hello Mr. Tican Aslen,

Thank you for providing me with the MoneyGram payment details. I appreciate your assistance in setting up the online bank account. However, before I proceed with the payment, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. Could you please explain what the account opening process Activation Fee covers? Is it a one-time fee or will there be any recurring charges?

2. Can you provide more information about the online banking services that will be available once the account is set up? Are there any specific features or benefits that I should be aware of?

3. How long does it usually take for the account to be activated after the payment is made? Will I receive any confirmation or login details once it's ready?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed with the payment.

Best wishes,
Edward

the money still remains your money into your online bank account.

subject: Re: Hello Online Fund Beneficiary Edward
body:
Hello Mr. Tican Aslen,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email and the information you have provided. I apologize if I haven't followed the directive on how to create my online fund transfer. Could you please explain it to me again? I want to make sure I understand the process correctly.

You mentioned that there is an account opening process Activation Fee. Can you please provide more details about this fee? How much is it and what does it cover?

I'm also curious about the benefits of having an online bank account. Could you elaborate on the advantages of accessing funding online and other services via the internet?

Thank you once again for your email, Mr. Aslen.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: Hello Online Fund Beneficiary Edward
body:
Hello Mr. Edward,

Thank you for providing me with the MoneyGram payment details. I appreciate
your assistance in setting up the online bank account. However, before I
proceed with the payment, I have a few questions regarding the process.( I
AM WAITING TO RECEIVED THE PAYMENT SLIP ATTACHMENT TODAY,)

1. Could you please explain what the account opening process Activation Fee
covers? Is it a one-time fee or will there be any recurring charges? ( TO
ACTIVITED YOUR ONLINE BANK ACCOUNT ONE TIME FEE AND THE MONEY YOU PAID WILL
BE CREDIT BACK INTO YOUR ONLINE BANK ACCOUNT WHICH YOU WILL SEE EVERYTHING
WITH YOUR TWO EYES )

2. Can you provide more information about the online banking services that
will be available once the account is set up? Are there any specific
features or benefits that I should be aware of? ( AFTER WE HAVE CREATED
YOUR ONLINE BANK ACCOUNT IN YOUR NAME. WE WILL GIVE YOU YOUR ONLINE BANK
ACCOUNT DETAILS LOGIN AND PASSWORD. SO THAT YOU CAN TRANSFER YOUR MONEY TO
ANY BANK OF YOUR CHOICE ALL OVER THE WORLD.)

3. How long does it usually take for the account to be activated after the
payment is made? Will I receive any confirmation or login details once it's
ready?( THE ONLINE BANK ACTIVATION WILL TAKE 24HOUR AFTER WE HAVE CONFIRM
THR THE PAYMENT SLIP ATTACHMENT TODAY. WE WILL SEND YOU YOUR BANK SECURITY
LOGIN AND PASSWORD DETAILS.)

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed with
the payment.

Thanks for your cooperation,
Best wishes,

Mr. Tican Aslen,
The Online Opening Account Control Department Turkey,
EUROPACLEAR BANK
Halaskargazi Cd. Sisli, Istanbul Turkey
